name: Let there be chaos at the garden party
name_original: Let there be chaos at the garden party
description:
Eat all food in a limited time. 

Arrow keys to move, space to jump.

Work on mobile too.

To replay , please hit F5 (replay button have a last minute bug -_-' sry...)

Project made without any game engine :)

Render engine : threeJs

Physic Engine : cannon-es

Credits : Florian Landras (3d Assets and code), Teva Landras (Musics), Morgan Pigeron (code) 

Our First Game Jam :) Thanks for playing !
